WorkflowInfo.Name: Audit changes to security policies
WorkflowInfo.Description: Alert when security policies has been changed
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:GetWindowEventLogs;Assembly=GetWindowEventLogs, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:GetWindowEventLogs Password="" Description="Get the logs of the windows according to the event type." TimeInSeconds="0" FilterComputer="" HostName="LocalHost" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Windows Event Logs" IsValid="True" HostId="1" FilterSource="" FilterDescription="" FilterEventCode="566" FilterUser="" MaxAge="01:00:00" x:Name="getWindowEventLogs1" Timeout="00:01:00" FilterType="" UserName="" EventType="Security" FilterCategory="" TypeName="GetWindowEventLogs" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%getWindowEventLogs1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="getWindowEventLogs1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Equals("&&&","0")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%getWindowEventLogs1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Security policies have been changed in the last hour" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16476"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE>%convertToHTMLTable1%</PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="DefaultBranch" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns5:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process searches for a specific event code in the Security Eventlog, and if exists sends the relevant records in the form of an HTML table by email. Schedule this process to run on an hourly basis to help you keep track of security breaches in your organization.
